definitions.text: return to its original or usable and functioning condition
examples: restore the forest to its original pristine condition

definitions.text: return to life; get or give new life or energy
examples: The week at the spa restored me
Restore the stolen painting to its rightful owner

definitions.text: restore by replacing a part or putting together what is torn or broken
bring back into original existence, use, function, or position
examples: restore the emperor to the throne
